data.message: C'mon slim why are you supporting this chump when your boy 50 wants to throw down with this dude? Back up your dude and forget about promoting for a sec.. your my idol and always will be but damn man get your shit straight

replies.message: Because Mayweather is an American Pride. Mayweather has accomplished the highest level of boxing, no one can beat him.

By dodging fights? Even if he has accomplished these "levels" of boxing "no one can beat" I sure fucking wouldn't pay to watch him box over other hall of fame boxers. If i wanted to be bored to death I would watch C-span.
Nobody can beat him? The 8x title winning multi class Manny P begs to differ.  He's the best to never fight the best.
Mayweather picks and chooses his fights.. Plus whoever hangs out with Justin Beiber needs to go NIGHT NIGHT!!!
rally rivera highest level of boxing wtf are u talking about mayweather has not beaten julio cesar chaves is 89-0 record u must not know boxing

Do you actually think Eminem runs this site? No one gets to 46-0 by picking and choosing their fights. Do I need to list all of the former champions he has walked through? Everyone is hosting on May weather because he hasn't fought one guy. Manny has fought the same guy 5 times the same guy that looked like a rookie against Mayweather. If the fight ever did take place and Mayweather won people would just say it was a fluke
mayweather fights are basically the same from the 1st round till the last. a whole lotta dodging brother! where's the whole concept of boxing there?
LOL where's the concept of boxing? Great head movement great defense unmatchable speed and true tactician. He's beaten the best of the best I think he has the concept of boxing down fairly well.
50 is a business man. im sure he understands
